snippet: Until Tuesday, with the crisis unfolding in Crimea, it was not clear that the United States team would have an opponent to face when it landed in Cyprus.
abstract: Ukrainian national soccer team finally arrives in Cyprus for exhibition match against the United States; match had remained in doubt up to the final moments due to crisis unfolding in their home country.
lead_paragraph: Until Tuesday, with the crisis unfolding in Crimea, it was not clear that the United States team would have an opponent to face when it landed in Cyprus.

headline.seo: U.S. Soccer Faces Ukraine in Key Match Before World Cup
headline.main: Chaos at Home, but Ukraine Arrives to Play U.S.
headline.print_headline: With Chaos at Home, Ukraine Arrives for Exhibition Matchup With U.S.

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations
